events.title: Variety Show
events.description: It doesn't matter what you're good at as long as you set the stage on fire. Mime, mimicry or even a skit, it doesn't matter as long as it's creative.Bring the band together, get them juices flowing and come up with the wittiest set possible.
events.rules: 1.Prelims will be conducted;2.Participating teams can have their own theme;3.Each team will be given 12 min for performance and 3min for stage setting;4.A team may have a Minimum of 6 members and maximum of 20;5. Only one team is allowed from one college;The Final Judgment will be mainly based on their Performance, Humor, Theme and Creativity;REGISTRATION FEE - 100 PER HEAD

events.title: IPL Bidding
events.description: Can you Moneyball your way to the top in what is arguably the most competitive sporting event of the year? You have a warchest. Make the most of it by bidding wisely to build your dream team. Remember, every single player matters in lifting the final trophy!
events.rules: 1.Each team should comprise of 2-3 people. (Can be from different colleges);2.The event will have 2 rounds: First, will be a written test round comprising of questions related to CRICKET alone;3.Top EIGHT teams from the first round will get through to the second round, which will be the auction;4.Based on the points scored during auction, winner will be declared;Decision of the coordinators are final;REGISTRATION FEE- Rs150 per team

events.title: Treasure hunt
events.description: Go on a quest acrosss the length and breadth of our sprawling campus to find the ultimate prize. Are you watching closely?
events.rules: 1.Number of players: 2-4 per team;2.Number of rounds: 2 (prelims and finals);3.Prelims -Written test on general questions(30 minutes);4.Finals – Hunt for your treasure;Registration FEE- Rs 60 per head

events.title: Adzap
events.description: Do you wish to be the anchor of teleshopping? Do you have the talent of attracting the crowd and sell your products? Are you creative enough to sell anything ranging from boring books to unused brains?If yes, try brainwashing us to buy your product! Think crazy and funny! Do anything, make sure that your product is sold!
events.rules: 1.A team should consist of 3-5 members;2.The prelims will be conducted based on the number of teams registered;3.The event consists of two rounds;4.Spontaneity, Humor and Creativity will be much appreciated;5.Preparation time of 3 minutes and performance time of 5 minutes will be provided to each team;REGISTRATION FEE -250 PER TEAM

events.title: Channel surfing
events.description: Are you the Swamiji who preaches spirituality? Are you Arnab Goswami? Are you the video jockey of a music channel?Warning: Channels will be changed within seconds! Come as a group and and ensure they don't switch the TV off!
events.rules: 1.The team will be given 3minutes duration;2.Number of participants: 3 – 4 per team;3.Rounds: 2;4.No vulgarity will be entertained;5.REGISTRATION FEE: RS 200/- per team;6.Registrations can be done on the spot;7.Judges decision will be final;8.Participants can switch between both English and Tamil.

events.title: Mix'N'Match
events.description: Are you quick enough to find the connect between the images in lightning speed? Join us to experience the thrilling expedition of puzzles, acting and speaking! Get a team together and express to impress.
events.rules: 1.2 members per team;2.Prelims will be conducted;3.Its all about talking, swapping then more talking and swapping again;4.Link the images, crack the hidden word and win the rewards;5.REGISTRATION- GENERAL REGISTRATION

events.title: Minute To Win It
events.description: Are you quicker than the quick brown fox? Do you have the ability to perform the given task in a minute?Put your precision and speed tp test! Team up and participate.
events.rules: 1.Only two members per team;2.Teams should only use the resources provided to them;3.On the spot registration;4.Judges decision are the final;5.REGISTRATION - GENERAL REGISTRATION
